name: Snowfall (Christopher Viquez)
description:
Untitled Game Jam #39
Hosted by Thedrdevin, LexLoco · #UntitledGameJam

Play as snowflakes ❄️ who need to fall to the ground to accumulate snowfall. 🌨️Isn't that how nature works? If you crash into enemy snowflakes 😈, you'll melt and respawn high in the sky. You must try to fall without colliding with anything. Beware of icicles 🧊 that come crashing down. Can you descend 1,000 feet successfully? 🏆
